body:
Maybe it would be enough to throw an error specific to complex numbers that says

```
ValueError: Can't optimize complex variables.
Express complex variables using tf.complex(a, b), where a and b are real.
```

A solution that works with complex numbers would involve creating two real variables, and replacing every occurence of the old one with `tf.complex(a, b)`.
Wouldn't that also involve copying the graph?
